article.title: Lockheed Martin Supports Deployed Cargo Unmanned Aircraft
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corp., Owego, N.Y., is being awarded an $8,907,747 modification to a previously awarded firm-fixed-price contract for the operational services in support of two cargo unmanned aircraft systems deployed in support of the Marine Corps. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Md., is the contracting activity.
